content.prompt: Which of the following was a characteristic of colonial Pennsylvania?

choices.label: Founder William Penn endorsed a policy of removing American Indians to the western region of the colony.
Poor farmland in the backcountry aggravated the colonyâ€™s economic woes.
The office of governor was an elective post.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
